resources.string: In order to use this feature, Glyph Progress requires permission of incoming notifications from the enabled apps.
Integrate the Glyph Interface with 3rd party apps
Glyph Progress processes notifications from enabled apps to provide an estimation of progress. May encounter some reliability issues. Most effective with apps that are set to English.
Integrates with third party apps to show the progress of ongoing rides and food delivery services. More to come.
Displaying the estimated status of the ongoing event on the Glyph Interface
